articles.title: Woodland Kingfisher
articles.contents: Show code # List all the html file found on in the reports/html folder f <- list.files(path = ".", patter = "*.html", recursive = TRUE) f_dirname <- lapply(f, dirname) f_basename <- lapply(f, basename) for (i_f_dir in unique(f_dirname)) { cat(paste("## ", tools::toTitleCase(stringr::str_replace_all(i_f_dir, "_", " ")))) cat("\n") for (i_f in seq_len(length(f))) { if (f_dirname[[i_f]] == i_f_dir) { cat(paste("* ", sub("\\.html$", "", f_basename[[i_f]]), ""), sep = "\n") } } cat("\n") } Basic Trajectory 16LN 16LO 16LP 20IK 22NO Technical Details 16LN 16LO 16LP 20IK 22NO
